raincorn

We are work to make the purposes on the web.

This page were created to list our stage of development. Sometimes we work in new features and stles but it not will show in our site. So we will list our issues, ideas and progress for this project. Our progress bar will help you to see the progress. If you have any ideas send for us, if you have ideas for projects in progress in this page you can create a pull request in our Github or send us an email, just stay in touch.

Marin Project

by Core team

Marin’s Project is the principal and high priority for us. In the development stage the Marin will guide and will be where the changes will be made.

20%

Ink Project

by Draw team

Ink Project is a project dedicated for the design and marketing of raincorn. This project is responsible for make a logo, brand and icon of raincorn.
